results.title: Risk of acute atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease in patients with acute and chronic pancreatitis
results.text_hl: However, the cumulative use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with a reduced risk of @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000208 @@@acute@@@ @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@ASCVD@@@ in the @DISEASE_Pancreatitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@acute pancreatitis@@@ cohort (HR 0.30, 95% CI 0.17-0.50).

results.title: Glycemic Outcomes of Second-Line Diabetes Drug Choice in a Real-World Population
results.journal: Mayo Clin Proc Innov Qual Outcomes
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@Hypoglycemia and@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000208 @@@acute metabolic complications@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000208 @@@AMCs@@@; @DISEASE_Ketosis @DISEASE_MESH:D007662 @@@ketoacidosis@@@, @DISEASE_Hyperglycemic_Hyperosmolar_Nonketotic_Coma @DISEASE_MESH:D006944 @@@hyperosmolarity@@@, and @DISEASE_Coma @DISEASE_MESH:D003128 @@@coma@@@) are glycemic outcomes that have high cost and high morbidity; these outcomes must be taken into consideration when choosing initial second-line therapy after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Wallia A, O'Brien MJ, Liss DT, Kang RH, Cooper AJ, Gilmer A, Ackermann RT. Glycemic Outcomes of Second-Line Diabetes Drug Choice in a Real-World Population Mayo Clin Proc Innov Qual Outcomes. 2021 Jun;5(3):675-681. PMID: 34195559

results.title: Medicine designed to combat diseases of affluence affects the early development of fish. How do plastic microparticles contribute?
results.text_hl: Also, it was hypothesized that @CHEMICAL_Polystyrenes @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011137 @@@polystyrene@@@ microparticles will increase the @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ of @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ to fish early-life stages. Embryonal @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000208 @@@acute toxicity@@@ tests on Danio rerio and Cyprinus carpio were carried out in order to describe the possible @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxic@@@ effects of @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Possible metformin-induced hepatotoxicity.
results.text_hl: To date, only 2 cases of possible @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced hepatotoxicity (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000208 @@@acute@@@ @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatitis@@@) have been reported worldwide.
